page.title: 192085 AROUND PORTESSIE
page.content: ABOUT ONE HUNDRED YEARS FROM NOW THERE WILL BE NO SCHOOL BECAUSE ONE WILL GET ONE'S LESSON ON THE COMPUTER. YOU WILL NEVER HAVE TO SAY "OH NO,IT IS RAINING." EVERY HOUSE WILL BE BUILT ON THE BEACH AND WHEN IT RAINS A BIG GLASS DOME WILL COME DOWN OVER YOUR DREAM HOUSE WITH ITS SAUNA, COMPUTER ROOM, SWIMMING POOL, GROW BY ITSELF GARDEN AND A GAMES ROOM WITH SNOOKER, DARTS AND ARCADE GAMES THAT YOU DON'T PAY FOR. TO COMMUNICATE, YOU WOULD USE SPEED BUSES THAT ARE REMOTE CONTROLLED AND LITTLE HOVER BIKES AND CARS. WITH YOUR BEACH, YOU GET A 4KM STRETCH OF WATER AND YOU GET A JETTY WITH A SPEEDBOAT, A PLAY CRAFT, A COUPLE OF FUN BOATS AND A MASSIVE CRUISER FOR SIX PEOPLE. {IDEAS BY SANDY McCONNACHIE.
